thread.title: VERBATIM: Johnson says Brexit gives 'grounds for hope'

title: VERBATIM: Johnson says Brexit gives 'grounds for hope'
text:
VERBATIM: Johnson says Brexit gives 'grounds for hope' Wednesday, February 14, 2018 - 00:48 
The UK's Foreign Minister Boris Johnson appealed to 'remainers' on Wednesday, saying they should not fear Brexit. He added Britain may choose to remain aligned with European Union standards for some products to help trade after Brexit, but London must have ultimate control over national regulatory decisions. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
The UK's Foreign Minister Boris Johnson appealed to 'remainers' on Wednesday, saying they should not fear Brexit. He added Britain may choose to remain aligned with European Union standards for some products to help trade after Brexit, but London must have ultimate control over national regulatory decisions.
